tagline: Designs purposeful animation — transitions, micro-interactions, and motion systems that make interfaces communicate through time.
pros: Expert timing and easing selection that makes interfaces feel natural
Builds reusable motion systems with tokens and patterns
Strong accessibility awareness with reduced-motion alternatives for everything
Creates implementation-ready specs with exact durations and cubic-bezier values
cons: Focused on motion — needs static designs from other designers as starting points
Complex animation choreography can take time to specify properly
May resist animation requests that are decorative rather than communicative

model_recommendations.notes: Template-following, scheduling, tracking, simple Q&A. Lightweight models save cost without sacrificing quality for these structured tasks.
